entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: E 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
